column4: The installer dies while trying to fsck one of the windows partitions, how do I keep it from doing the fsck?
try Hiren's boot disc, it has partition magic on it, set up your partitions then run the installer
thx, but that seems to to be an awfully complicated solution to something that seems to be an awfully simple problem (i.e. a minor partitioning option)
do kubuntu or xubuntu use the same install script/gparted?
